label: A2BC4_hR7_166_c_a_2c-002
title: MnBi$_{2}$Te$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
We use the data taken at 10K.  Except for the magnetic ordering there is no substantial change in the structure up to room temperature. 
 The ICSD entry is from the room-temperature measurements of (Aliev, 2019). 
 This structure is nearly identical to \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C4_hR7_166_a_c_2c-002}{GeSb$_{2}$Te$_{4}$}, but the ordering of the tellurium atoms is different in the two cases.
